DOC.criteria: Informed consent give subject Healthy young man ( age 18 45 ) insightful study ( WST > 95 ) Right handedness At least one time consumption Cannabis le 10 times/ per lifetime , consumption psychotropic agent ( despite coffee nicotine ) , alcohol abuse Negative drugscreening time screen Body Mass Index 18 30 Lack accountability Participation interventional trial Severe medical neurological illness , especially cardiovascular , renal , advanced respiratory , hematological endocrinological failure infectious disease ( acute hepatitis A , B C HIV ) assess time screen subject 's history , clinical examination laboratory testing , discretion investigator Any known psychiatric illness participant 's history Known family history concern psychiatric disorder Cannabis consumption within last six month Consumption illegal drug ( except cannabis history , see ) Intake interfere medication , discretion investigator High intracranial pressure Any disorder stereoscopic vision ( measure TNOTest , Lamerics , Utrecht ) hear deficit Contraindications due Investigators Brochure Contraindication Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( e.g . cardiac pacemaker , claustrophobia , attach brace , body metal , tattoo ) lumbar puncture ( e.g . local systemic infection , disturbance blood coagulation , medication anticoagulant like Phenprocoumon )
